main_definition: Evening refers to the period of time between late afternoon and night, typically from sunset until bedtime.

meanings_and_examples.example: I usually take a walk in the evening when it's not too hot.
The sky turned orange during the beautiful evening at sunset.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A social gathering in the late afternoon or early evening
meanings_and_examples.example: They invited us to their house for a lovely dinner party in the evening.

meanings_and_examples.definition: End of a day's activities, signaling relaxation and winding down time
meanings_and_examples.example: After work, I enjoy reading a book or watching TV as the evening winds down.
